events.text: Ok, well, considering your situation we can try something radical. You both can pretend you’re dead. Maybe then you can touch your parents' heart.
I have a secret beverage. If you drink a small dose of it you'll fall asleep. You look dead for twelve hours.
I think I read a story very similar to this, which turned out to be the most famous love tragedy.
That's not a good idea. What if something goes wrong? I'm too young to die!
We don't have much time, Friar. The festival starts tomorrow and we have a long way to go!
Humm… I have a better idea! You're going to run away. Leave for your festival and stay there for a few days.
When you come back, everything will be different!
What are you going to do?
Don't worry. I have a plan. I'll talk to Juliet’s nanny, and we'll take care of everything.
Now take my carriage and go to your festival!
Oh! And you, Romeo's friend, don't talk about this to anyone! If their parents find out what really happened, they're going to be upset.

events.question: Would you promise to keep it as a secret?

events.choice: Ok, I'll keep it as a secret!

events.text: Thanks for your understanding! This plan will work my kids, believe me.
Please, my friend, that's the only way to make me happy!
OK Romeo, I'll keep it as a secret.
Ok kids, you have to go. It's time!
